page.title: 19Sawston/Babraham Chores
page.content: Typical chores and duties expected of Junior age children in Sawston and Babraham in 1985. {Kitchen Chores}- washing up, preparing food, clearing tables after meals, laying tables before meals, some cooking. {Household }- tidying room, making bed, dusting, cleaning their own rooms and doing some of the ironing. {Care of pets}- feeding, grooming, cleaning out and exercising pets. {Gardening}- weeding and picking fruit and vegetables. {Siblings}- looking after younger brothers and sisters. {Parents}- running errands, fetching papers, making hot drinks, posting letters, washing cars, decorating. {Cleaning}- bikes, shoes, clothes. {Homework}- learning spellings, tables, music practice, finishing school work.
